message: Not trying to be a Group dropping whore here, but as this is entrepreneurship, I figured I'd let you know there is a Group I'm trying to get started for connecting founders and programmers/designers. Hopefully some beautiful partnerships will be created! https://convore.com/the-lounge/
Oh okay. I actually have a mobile malware research lab that I use in a virtual environment
A place to interact with programmers and founders is BetaCandy.com. It's invite only, but me being the cofounder, I just may have some invites. Email me @ nick[@]betacandy.com
Myself and some friends from school are also working on building a new Linux
Hi benwax, I am a founder of a computer repair business that will grow into a malware research facility
oh. Not to be rude but what is funny about the malware research and computer repair? The Linux I get that.
My bad. I thought you were being ironic/sarcastic. Lost in translation.
I've been to a BeMyApp event this month and it was awesome http://www.bemyapp.com/ . It connects founders, programmers and designers for a week end.
Working at Coolendar New Planning Experience: http://coolendar.com
